meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lloyd Caesar Liz Greenwood Lanny Timan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6228.

td.p: Lloyd Caesar, an office manager from Watervliet, New York
Liz Greenwood, a graduate student in economics originally from Wyomissing, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $1,599)
Lanny Timan, a business manager from Chicago, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $17,600)

tr.td: TURNING 50 IN 2011
TV PRIVATE EYES
BIOLO"G"
AMERICA BEFORE THE REVOLUTION
PLUMBING
MAN IN THE MIDDLE
